题目:
Chairman Mao was born on ______.
A. December 26, 1893
B. December 1893, 26
C. 1893, 26 December
D. 1893, December, 26
提示: 英语中年、月、日的表达顺序为“月份+序数词+年”。

题目:
There are ______ days in a year.
A. three hundreds sixty-five
B. three hundreds and sixty-five
C. three hundred and sixty-five
D. three hundred and sixty five
提示: 具体数字中，hundred 用单数形式，且需用 and 连接十位和个位。

题目:
______ people go to see the new film every day.
A. Hundred
B. Hundreds of
C. Hundred of
D. Hundreds
提示: hundreds of 是固定短语，表示“成百上千的”。

题目:
______ people have been killed by traffic accidents in the past 5 years.
A. Thousands of
B. Three thousands
C. Thousand of
D. One thousand of
提示: thousands of 表示“成千上万的”，用于不确切数量。

题目:
His second son is in ______.
A. Four Class, Two Grade
B. Class Four, Grade Two
C. Grade Two, Class Four
D. class four, grade two
提示: 英语中班级和年级的表达顺序为“Class + 基数词, Grade + 基数词”，首字母大写。

题目:
You can find the article in this book. Please turn to ______. You can copy it.
A. page fifth
B. the page five
C. Fifth Page
D. Page Five
提示: 页码表达为“Page + 基数词”，首字母大写。

题目:
About ______ of the students in this class are from Asian countries.
A. four-fifth
B. fourth-fifths
C. four-fifths
D. fourths-fifth
提示: 分数表达为“分子（基数词）+分母（序数词复数）”，分子大于1时分母加s。

题目:
His father was born in ______ World War.
A. Second
B. the Second
C. the second
D. the Two
提示: 序数词前加 the，且“二战”为专有名词需大写。

题目:
______ of people come to visit the Summer Palace every year.
A. A thousand and a thousand
B. The thousands and thousands
C. Thousand and thousand
D. Thousands and thousands
提示: 固定短语 thousands and thousands 表示“成千上万的”。

题目:
My uncle became a teacher in his ______.
A. twenty
B. twentieth
C. twenties
D. twentieths
提示: in one’s twenties 表示“在某人二十多岁时”。

题目:
—What time is it now?
—It’s ______ to twelve.
A. the quarter
B. a quarter
C. two quarters
D. quarter
提示: “差一刻钟”用 a quarter to + 小时。

题目:
Today we are going to learn ______ lesson.
A. nine
B. the nine
C. ninth
D. the ninth
提示: 序数词前加 the 表示“第几课”。

题目:
In English, 3.58 is pronounced as ______.
A. three point five eight
B. three five eight
C. three point fifty eight
D. three point five eighty
提示: 小数点读作 point，后面数字逐个读。

题目:
The new library is ______ times the size of the old one.
A. the nine
B. nine
C. ninth
D. the ninth
提示: 倍数表达为“基数词 + times”。

题目:
International Working Women’s Day is ______.
A. March 8
B. the March 8
C. May 1
D. the May 1
提示: 节日日期中月份前不加 the。

题目:
The ______ month of the year is October.
A. five
B. ten
C. tenth
D. six
提示: October 是第十个月，需用序数词 tenth。

题目:
It took me ______ to write this letter.
A. twelve minute and three hour
B. three hour and twelve minute
C. twelve minutes and three hours
D. three hours and twelve minutes
提示: 小时和分钟均需用复数形式，且小时在前。

题目:
—Can you write the number ninety-five thousand, six hundred and twenty-seven?
—Yes, it is ______.
A. 95,627
B. 95,672
C. 59,627
D. 59,726
提示: 英文数字每三位加逗号，顺序为“千位+百位”。

题目:
—How many pupils are there in your school?
—There are five ______.
A. hundreds
B. hundred
C. hundred of
D. hundreds of
提示: 具体数字后 hundred 用单数形式。

题目:
The Games of ______ Olympiad in 2012 was held in the city of London.
A. 30
B. the 30
C. 30th
D. the 30th
提示: 序数词前加 the 表示“第几届”。
